insights.title: Production Line Optimization Opportunity
insights.summary: Line C shows 15% under-utilization. Recommending shift rebalancing for +12% throughput.

insights.title: Quality Trend Analysis - Q4 Results
insights.summary: Defect rate dropped to 1.8% across all lines. Welding quality improved after training program.

insights.title: Supply Chain Risk Assessment: EU Logistics
insights.summary: EU logistics delays expected in Q2 due to new border regulations. Recommend buffer stock increase.

insights.title: Carbon Footprint Reduction Progress
insights.summary: Carbon reduction targets on track: 22% reduction YoY. Bio-composite adoption accelerating.

insights.title: Market Demand Forecast: Modular Housing 2025
insights.summary: Modular housing demand in Portugal projected to grow 35% in 2025. Expansion recommended.

insights.title: Material Cost Trend: Steel Price Volatility
insights.summary: Steel prices showing 8% quarterly volatility. Lock-in contracts recommended for Q2-Q3.
